activities: Provide services to pharmaceutical, biotech and medical device companies.  BSSI may collect and process data relating to study participants, study investigators and their staff, medical & healthcare professionals, contractors and consultants, in addition to human resource data.  BSSI may transfer data between members of the EU and the U.S.
privacyprograms: BSSI adheres to the HIPAA law for human protection and The Code of Federal Regulations.  BSSI is a member of CBBB Privacy Protection Program.
recoursemech: If a complaint regarding BSSI's use of Personal Information is raised by an EU based member, BSSI will investigate and try to resolve any dispute.  If the dispute cannot be resolved, BSSI will participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by CBBB (BBB EU Safe Harbor Program).
